ARABIC: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when their brother Hud said to them, 'Will you not have taqwa?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When their brother Hud said to them: "Will you not take heed?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall, when their brother Hud said to them: "Have you no fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Their brother Hud asked them, "Why do you not have fear of God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: When their fellowman Hud said to them, “Do you not fear?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: When their brother Hud said to them: "Will you not have Taqwa"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: When their brother Hud said to them: Will you not guard (against evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when their brother Hood said to them, 'Will you not be godfearing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: When their brother Hud said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: When their brother Hud said Unto them: fear ye not?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when Hud, their brother, said to them, ‘Will you not be wary [of Allah]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Behold, their brother Hud said to them: "Will ye not fear (Allah)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: When their brother Hud said to them: "Will you not fear Allah and obey Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When their brother Hood said to them: 'Will you not be cautious?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When their brother Hud said to them, “Do you not fear?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: When their brother Hud said to them, "Will you not fear Allah?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:124] when Hūd, their brother, said to them, ‘Will you not fear God?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (When their brother) their Prophet (Hud said unto them: Will ye not ward off (evil)) the worship of other than Allah?
